net.jawr.web.resource.bundle.renderer
Interface BundleRenderer

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractBundleLinkRenderer, CSSHTMLBundleLinkRenderer, JavascriptHTMLBundleLinkRenderer
public interface BundleRenderer

This interface defines operations to generate import tags for bundled resources.

Author:
Jordi Hernández Sellés

Field Summary
static java.lang.String GZIP_PATH_PREFIX
          Prefix to append to every URL that points to a gzipped version of a resource.
 
Method Summary
 ResourceBundlesHandler getBundler()
           
 void renderBundleLinks(java.lang.String requestedPath, java.lang.String contextPath, java.lang.String variantKey, java.util.Set includedBundles, boolean useGzip, java.io.Writer out)
          Render a link to the specified resource.
 

Field Detail

GZIP_PATH_PREFIX

static final java.lang.String GZIP_PATH_PREFIX
Prefix to append to every URL that points to a gzipped version of a resource.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Method Detail

renderBundleLinks

void renderBundleLinks(java.lang.String requestedPath,
                       java.lang.String contextPath,
                       java.lang.String variantKey,
                       java.util.Set includedBundles,
                       boolean useGzip,
                       java.io.Writer out)
                       throws java.io.IOException
Render a link to the specified resource.

Parameters:
requestedPath - String Path that identifies a resource bundle id or one of its members.
contextPath - String The context path to prepend to the URL.
includedBundles - Set A set of names previously added. None of them will be written out as links to avoid duplication.
useGzip - boolean If true, the gzip prefix is added to the URLs so the link will point to the gzipped version.
out - Writer Writer to output the tags, typically a JSPWriter.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

getBundler

ResourceBundlesHandler getBundler()
Returns:
ResourceBundlesHandler The resources handler used by this renderer.
